author: weaver
msg: I have just put in two absolutely atrocious hacks to fix issues with references not working

author: weaver
msg: expose the PersistenceStore this component is using making it easier
to manipulate the transaction, if needed.

author: weaver
msg: make sure the PersistenceStore is removed from the storeLastUsed map
to prevent unneeded checking of closed stores.

author: weaver
msg: only close the OTMConnection if it is still open
